Message-ID: <17248.61.162.959279670@...>
Date:	Thu, 18 Nov 1999 09:49:20 -1000
From:	=?iso-8859-1?Q?Bj=F8rn_Hansen?= <bhansen@...
Subject: Re: Re:Gladiators

Hmmm,  I think perhaps you don't understand the concept of "Shareware".  See
there is a demo available which you can download and play for FREE(which
might suit you well since cheapness seems to be your chief quality).  Now,
if you like the demo enough and want more, then you pay for the full
version, thereby encouraging the author to keep making it better.  This
concept would work very poorly however if the world only consisted of
dishonest scum who think everything should be given to them and  won't pay
even a small amount of money for a quality product.  If you're really
interested in free stuff, I'm afraid you're running the wrong OS.  But then,
most of the games are written for MS operating systems  which is really too
bad.
